channel.title: Quality of a song
channel.description:
Well, I really like Black Metal. Most of you know that the vocals are a tiny bit hard to understand because of the growling :P. But now I downloaded this song, and the guitars/other instruments are much louder then the vocals. This shouldnt be the case. Now my question is how to get the vocals louder, or is there no way to do that?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Quality of a song

item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Quality of a song

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I dowloaded a partial discography with a torrent, but it missed 2 cd’s. So I used albumbase to get the other 2, wich were bad quality. Also there are only 2 torrents from Catamenia, that contain the same albums, and they both are poorly seeded (2 seeders max).

Read full topic

item.title: Quality of a song
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Redownload the song (from somewhere else). You could probably make it sound a bit better with filters+eq, but the time it would take to do you might as well just find a better quality version.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality of a song
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:1, topic:143261”]Well, I really like Black Metal. Most of you know that the vocals are a tiny bit hard to understand because of the growling :P. But now I downloaded this song, and the guitars/other instruments are much louder then the vocals. This shouldnt be the case. Now my question is how to get the vocals louder, or is there no way to do that?

Thanks in advance.[/quote]

Where did you “download” this song from? It could be a crappy rip of a CD or someone just playing one of those “previews” on Napster and ripping the audio from the sound buffer.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality of a song
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Try using an equalizer. On my phone you can make vocals louder or instruments louder or sharper and stuff.

Read full topic
